::: {.minipage data-latex="{\textwidth}"}
## `MsgBox`

Displays a message (with optional title).

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
MsgBox(string message,
       string title)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `string` message | The message to show. |
| `string` title | (Optional) The title of the message box. |
:::
